name: Yeet the Chibi playtest
description:
Please fill the feedback form! https://forms.gle/EufA7y9cftHiormd9
The game will look and play better when it's done, right now you can see it as an alpha version!

It's time to yeet chibidoki to new heights! Using the laws of physics and her powerful secondary center of gravity (head), she's capable of altering her trajectory! Cool!

Features
- Punt Chibi into the air and dash with a simple flick of her head!
- Avoid obstacles, collect coins, and go as far as you can!
- Buy items to customize Chibi and your gameplay!

How to play
- Click and hold the left mouse button to dash.
- Collect coins to spend in the shop.
- If you hit the ground when going too slow or too fast, you lose!
- Otherwise, you lose some speed and bounce back up.

Credits
- Game music (モノクロシアター) by Shimtone
- Shop music (Wii Shop channel BGM) by Nintendo
- Font (Dimbo) by Jayvee Inaguas

Installation
Just unzip the folder anywhere and run the .exe.
You may delete the folder at anytime to uninstall the game!
